evidence.claim: Selectsys utilizes AWS cloud services for scalability and deployment.
The company is compliant with HIPAA regulations, emphasizing data security in health tech.
Selectsys supports FHIR standards for health data exchange.
They implement integration middleware for EDI transaction sets, enhancing their platform connectivity.
Selectsys leverages Azure for data management and analytics.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of X12 or clearinghouse capabilities found.
